topic.fullpath: Topic :: Text Editors :: Integrated Development Environments (IDE)

name: Filter Through Command
short_description: Filter Through Command is a simple Eclipse plug-in that adds unlimited functionality to Eclipse. With Filter Through Command, you can run selections of text through shell commands and have the output immediately inserted into the current document.
